lines: 1. Jesus walked this lonesome valley; He had to walk it by Himself. O nobody else could walk it for Him. He had to walk it by Himself.
2. I must go and stand my trial. I have to stand it by myself. O nobody else could stand it for me. I have to stand it by myself.
3. Jesus walked this lonesome valley; He had to walk it by Himself. O nobody else could walk it for Him. He had to walk it by Himself.
